QuestBattleTemplate.QuestBattleDescription: You arrive at an active chaos portal. The vile thing pulses with arcane magic, chaos forces are invading in minor numbers from their realm.
QuestBattleTemplate.QuestBattleSolveText: Attempt to defeat the chaos forces present and close the portal.
QuestBattleTemplate.InactiveDescription: The portal lies dormant. Come back at a later time.
